tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE text_data_pattern (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,title TEXT,content TEXT,timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE language_models (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,name TEXT,description TEXT,version FLOAT);
CREATE TABLE word_frequency (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,word TEXT,count INTEGER,timestamp TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE model_evaluations (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,model_id INTEGER,evaluation_result FLOAT,timestamp TIMESTAMP);

CREATE TABLE historical_text_data (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  text_data TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE language_models (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  model_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE text_patterns (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  pattern VARCHAR(255),
  pattern_type VARCHAR(50),
  frequency INT
)

CREATE TABLE generated_text (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  text_output TEXT,
  generated_by INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE analysis_logs (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  log_message TEXT,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)
